name: cards fall where they may
description:
XII-The Hanged Man   XX-Judgement   XIII- Death (You are made, for the most part, out of temporal anomalies.) / (You were a real person, once. Now you're just a forgery remade in your maker's image.) / (Your heart still isn't beating.)

cards fall where they may is an interactive blaseball twine anthology, containing 3 stories about morrow doyle, peanutiel duffy, and gerund pantheocide respectively. it is 12k words (with each story being around 4k) and deals a lot with themes of regret, guilt, and sacrifice. please make sure to check the first page for a link to the full list of content warnings.
this story uses occasional flashing text, colours, and animation, as well as elements which may cause eyestrain.  additionally, the formatting is not mobile friendly. please take care when playing.

art by jun
